trans-unit.source: Represents a panel in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> control.
ToolStripStatusLabel is a version of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> designed specifically for use in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripStatusLabel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> 에 사용할 수 있도록 설계 된</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel> 의 버전이

trans-unit.source: The special features include <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.BorderStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.BorderSides%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel.Spring%2A>.
A ToolStripStatusLabel can contain text or an icon that reflects the status of an application.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripStatusLabel 텍스트 또는 응용 프로그램의 상태를 반영 하는 아이콘을 포함할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection> class to find, add, or remove ToolStripStatusLabel objects.
trans-unit.target: 사용 된 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection>클래스를 찾기, 추가 또는 ToolStripStatusLabel 개체를 제거 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemCollection>

trans-unit.source: Although ToolStripStatusLabel replaces and adds functionality to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> control of previous versions, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: ToolStripStatusLabel 대체 기능을 추가 하 고 있지만 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>이전 버전의 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>선택 하는 경우 이전 버전과 호환성 및 이후 사용을 모두 유지 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref> class that displays the specified image.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"> </xref> 지정된 된 이미지를 표시 하는 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> that is displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref> class that displays the specified text.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"> </xref> 지정된 된 텍스트를 표시 하는 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> representing the text to be displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref> class that displays the specified image and text.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"> </xref> 지정 된 이미지 및 텍스트를 표시 하는 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> representing the text to be displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> that is displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref>.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref> class that displays the specified image and text, and that carries out the specified action when the user clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"> </xref> 클래스 지정 된 이미지와 텍스트를 표시 하 고 사용자가 클릭 하면 지정된 된 작업을 수행 하는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> representing the text to be displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> that is displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref>.
Specifies the action to carry out when the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 에 컨트롤을 클릭할 때 수행할 동작을 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref> class with the specified name that displays the specified image and text, and that carries out the specified action when the user clicks the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"> </xref> 지정 된 이름의 지정 된 이미지와 텍스트를 표시 하 고 사용자가 클릭 하면 지정된 된 작업을 수행 하는 클래스는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> representing the text to be displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Drawing.Image"></xref> that is displayed on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref>.
Specifies the action to carry out when the control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 에 컨트롤을 클릭할 때 수행할 동작을 지정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref>.
Gets or sets a value that determines where the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref> is aligned on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 위치를 결정 하는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"> </xref> 에서 정렬 되는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The meaning of the Alignment property is affected by the setting of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.RightToLeft%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 설정의 영향을 받는 맞춤 속성의 의미는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.RightToLeft%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.RightToLeft%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItemAlignment"></xref> values.
Gets or sets a value that indicates which sides of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref> show borders.
trans-unit.target: 방향을 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"> </xref> 테두리를 표시 합니다.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabelBorderSides"></xref> values.
The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabelBorderSides"></xref>.
Gets or sets the border style of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref>.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Border3DStyle"></xref> values.
The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Border3DStyle"></xref>.
The value of BorderStyle is not one of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Border3DStyle"></xref> values.
Gets the default margin of an item.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Padding"></xref> representing the margin.
Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref> can be fitted.
trans-unit.target: 있는 사각형 영역의 크기를 검색 한 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"> </xref> 들어갈 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The custom-sized area for a control.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤에 대 한 사용자 지정 크기 영역입니다.

trans-unit.source: An ordered pair of type <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref>, representing the width and height of a rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 형식의 정렬 된 쌍 <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref>, 사각형의 높이 너비를 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem.Paint"></xref> event.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs"> </xref> 하는 이벤트 데이터를 포함 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref> automatically fills the available space on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> as the form is resized.
trans-unit.target: 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 여부는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"> </xref> 에 사용 가능한 공간을 자동으로 채워진는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref> 폼 크기가 조정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Set the Spring property to `true` to enable the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel> to smoothly resize along with its container.
trans-unit.target: Spring 속성을 설정 `true` 사용할 수 있도록는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel>를 해당 컨테이너 자연스럽 게 조정 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"></xref> automatically fills the available space on the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> as the form is resized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripStatusLabel"> </xref> 에 사용 가능한 공간을 자동으로 채워진는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref> 폼이 고, 그렇지 않으면 크기가 조정 된 대로 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
